metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1129 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way signature calculation was handled by cephx authentication protocol. An attacker having access to ceph cluster network who is able to alter the message payload was able to bypass signature checks done by cephx protocol. Ceph branches master, mimic, luminous and jewel are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: ceph package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2.4+dfsg1-0ubuntu1').
